Function reference

All functions

adjust_population()
Adjust microdata to WDI population levels when the number of reporting levels is equal or greater than 2
create_cache_file()
Cache survey data

db_clean_data()

Create survey estimation table
db_filter_inventory()
Filter inventory
db_ppp_list()
Create generic list of PPP version according the ppp year, release version and adaptation version
delete_old_file()
Delete cache files that are no longer in use
distance_weight()
get weights from survey year to reference year
filter2list()
FIlter data.frame and convert it to list
find_new_svy_data()
Find which data is not available in cache folder or has changed SVY ID
is_growth_same_direction()
Find whether svy growth and nac growth go in the same direction
is_same_direction()
Is growth from survyes the same of NAC
is_to_interpolate()
is this lineup year to interpolate?
pip_update_cache_inventory()
Update correspondence inventory file
ppp_filter()
Filter PPP data from using the structure of pipload::pip_load_aux("ppp")
process_svy_data_to_cache()
Process survey data to cache file
same_dir_growth()
same_dir_growth
same_dir_growth_factor()
growth factor when interpolation is in the same direction
save_aux_data()
Save auxiliary data.
save_survey_data()

ts_cache_read_ok()
Check that all cache files load correctly
uniq_vars_to_attr()
convert variables with unique values along the data set to attributes and then remove those unique variables
